The worst thing about open border and sanctuary city policies is that Americans are the ones who suffer the most. Subsequently, the very people who vow they are all in to help the little guy are encouraging some of the most evil people and policies America has ever seen.

No one in Aurora, Colorado voted to have their apartments overrun by violent, Venezuelan gangs but that is the reality for far too many residents.

title: Watch: Woke Mayor's big mad at residents saying mean things about "newcomers" (aka illegal migrants)
